channel.title: My Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in My Notes on

item.description: A banana and almond butter smoothie. Both bananas and almond butter are high in calories and nutrients, which can help with weight gain
A handful of dried fruits such as apricots, dates, or figs. These are nutrient-dense and high in calories, making them good for weight gain
A handful of mixed nuts and seeds. These are high in protein, healthy fats, and calories, making them an excellent snack for weight gain
A bowl of buckwheat porridge with non-dairy milk (like soy or oat), topped with a drizzle of honey or maple syrup for added calories and a side of fruit such as a sliced banana
Oatmeal made with almond milk or other non-dairy milk, topped with fruits such as berries and a spoonful of almond or peanut butter.

Scrambled tofu with saut√©ed mushrooms, bell peppers, and a side of gluten-free toast. Tofu is a great source of protein and the vegetables provide fibre without being too hard on your digestive system
Baked sweet potato topped with black beans, diced avocado, and a dollop of non-dairy yogurt. This is a balanced meal with a good mix of complex carbohydrates, protein, and healthy fats
Roasted eggplant and zucchini lasagna with gluten-free lasagna sheets and a cashew-based “cheese” sauce. This meal is high in fiber and protein, and the cashews add healthy fats
Tofu stir-fry with a variety of vegetables like broccoli, carrots and baby corn. Use coconut oil or olive oil for cooking and serve it over brown rice.
Avocado on gluten-free toast. Avocado is rich in healthy fats and calories, which can help with weight gain
A small bowl of homemade popcorn made with olive oil. Popcorn is a light snack that’s still high in fibre and calories when made with oil
Rice cakes topped with almond butter. This is a light but calorie-dense snack that can be easily digested
A serving of lentil soup with carrots, celery, onions, and spinach. Pair it with a slice of gluten-free bread. Lentils are high in protein and fiber, and the vegetables add an extra nutrient boost
Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (like bell peppers, zucchini, and eggplant) and chickpeas. Dress it with olive oil and lemon juice for some healthy fats and flavour.
A serving of vegetable and brown rice risotto. Brown rice is a good source of complex carbohydrates and the vegetables add additional nutrients

A smoothie made with banana, non-dairy milk, a scoop of plant-based protein powder, and a handful of spinach or kale. The banana and protein powder will help increase your calorie intake, and the greens provide some extra nutrients without being too harsh on your digestive system
A glass of homemade smoothie made with ripe mango, non-dairy yogurt, a spoonful of ground flaxseeds, and a dash of honey.
A bowl of non-dairy yogurt (such as almond or coconut-based) with a drizzle of honey or maple syrup and a sprinkling of chia seeds.
1. Type 192.168.0.1 in your browser 2. Click on Security 3. Login as Username = admin and Password = nowtv

item.title: (Stage Get-up) Attack
item.description: Press attack while hanging from the ledge Gives you invulnerability during the attack

item.title: (Stage Get-up) Jump
item.description: Press jump or tilt the control stick upwards while hanging from the ledge Makes you vulnerable at the start, but allows you to act a moment after

item.title: (Stage Get-up) Roll
item.description: Press the shield button Makes you invulnerable halfway in

item.title: Attacks
item.description: Ground Attacks While grounded you cna [[notes/Smash Ultimate/Pages/Jab|jab]] by pressing A If you tilt the control stick so the character starts running, and then press A, then the character will perform a [[notes/Smash Ultimate/Pages/Dash Attack|dash attack]]

item.title: Dash Attack
item.description: Tilt the stick so the character runs and then press A

item.title: Jab
item.description: Press A while grounded

item.title: Movement
item.description: Release the control stick to turn around faster Fast Falling Press down at the peak of the characters jump to make them fast fall

item.title: Neutral Air - Nair
item.description: Press A while airborne with no directional input

item.title: Regular get-up
item.description: Tilting the control stick towards the stage Provides only 1 frame of vulnerability before you can shield

item.title: Shielding
item.description: You can tilt the shield by holding shield + B at the same time If the shield takes too much damage it will break and leave you stunned

item.title: Smash Attack
item.description: Smash the control stick and press A simultaneously

item.title: Smash Ultimate
item.description: Guides [[notes/Smash Ultimate/Pages/Movement|Movement]] [[notes/Smash Ultimate/Pages/Shielding|Shielding]] [[notes/Smash Ultimate/Pages/Attacks|Attacks]] Characters

item.title: Spotdodge
item.description: Press Down while shielding

item.title: Tilt
item.description: Gently tilt the stick and press A
